Review Date: 2019/05/27
Store: Arte Clavo
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Arte Clavo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '2.04 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Liquid Volume': '0.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.65 x 3.27 x 2.99 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Review Text: I do nails and I only use this brand. It lasts long, cures great, only takes about 2 coats and the color choices are amazing!
Review Title: I only buy this brand
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YIROO Ombre Blonde Loose Curly Lace Front Synthetic Wigs for Women 20 inches With Natural Hairline 2 Tones 4/27 Color Deep L Part Hair Glueless High Density Wig (20 inches, OT4/27)
Review Date: 2019/07/21
Store: YIROO
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'YIROO', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 6.9 x 3.2 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
Review Text: Ladies let me tell you this is a great synthetic wig!  It comes true to the pictures but it did not come in the nice box like the ones in the videos.  I myself didn't prefer the color on myself so I did airbrush it with my Luminous Air brush makeup to give it the darker red tones you see in my pictures. The curls were too much for me so I paddle brushed the heck out of the wig, then with my flatiron on about 300° ran it through the hair to relax the curls even more. I love how it blends seamlessly with my natural hair line. I did cut just a few baby hairs to blend with my own. The wig is so light on my head, the hair is so soft but it tangled like crazy before I straightened the curls out.
Review Title: Great wig, true to picture. Buy it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MERISIHAIR Long Kinky Curly Wavy Hair with Bangs Black Wig for Girl Heat Friendly Synthetic Party Cosplay Wigs
Review Date: 2019/10/05
Store: MERISIHAIR
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'MERISIHAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 4.8 x 1.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '720562864673'}
Review Text: This wig is not worth the money! The scalp is this white plastic thing that you can't color or remove without cutting the wefts. The hair tangles so badly and it just looks wigy.
Review Title: No girl!  Don't do it!
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a preference for cosmetics and beauty products that cater to specific needs, particularly for oily skin and long-lasting performance. High ratings are consistently given to products such as pressed powders and gel nail polishes, indicating a fondness for effective solutions. Sentiment analysis shows a clear appreciation for brands known for durability and cosmetic performance.

Common themes reveal a focus on products that enhance personal aesthetics, particularly through make-up and hair care. The individual favors quality gel nail polishes, showing loyalty to specific brands that offer vibrant color ranges and lasting results. Contrastingly, lower ratings are given to hair products that fail to meet expectations, indicating a demand for quality and realism, particularly in wigs.

Quality preferences lean towards items that are non-toxic, cruelty-free, and well-reviewed in terms of longevity and user satisfaction. While price sensitivity is not explicitly stated, the negative evaluation of poorer-quality wigs suggests a reluctance to compromise on value for money.

In summary, this person favors high-quality, effective beauty products, particularly for oily skin and hair solutions that match their aesthetic needs. Loyalty to trusted brands is evident, with a pronounced intolerance for subpar quality, reinforcing a clear preference for performance and reliability in their beauty purchases.

target_interaction.title: Deceptive Description
target_interaction.text: The description is deceptive I did not get wig caps with these and I tried to at least like the bands but they just slip all over my head. Very disappointed, don't waste your money.
target_interaction.title_meta: 4 Pieces Adjustable Silicone Wig Hair Band Set, 2 Pieces Non-slip Wig Grip Band Sweatproof Seamless Wig Headband and 2 Pieces Stocking Wig Cap for Women Unisex Soft Hair Band
